name: LuckyBomb Casino Slots
description:
Count up your coins and BIG wins with LuckyBomb Casino Slots - the best new BONUS casino slot game featuring your favorite Vegas style machines! Spin your favorite 5-reel video slots and 3-reel 777 classic slot machines for the best BONUS slots experience ever!

Claim your 1 million BONUS COINS now and start spinning on AMAZING BONUS slot machines at LBC for the most thrilling experience!

No need to look elsewhere - we've got the hottest BONUS online slot machines:
* Watch the coins pile up in the highly popular Dazzling DIamonds.
* Enter the exciting world of Fortune Circus.
* Find the Headless Horseman's head for the ultimate payout.
* Tame the Rising Bulls for the EPIC WINS.
* More HUGE WINS on BONUS slot games in the palm of your hand!

We have even more features:
* BONUS slot coins: Collect the store bonus every hour.
* Super Wheel: spin the wheel every hour and a half to raise your bank.
* Play with others: Tournaments to determine who is the best of the best!
* AND MORE!

Join LBC, claim your 1 MILLION BONUS coins, and enjoy all of the BONUS spins and bonus games we have to offer to hit the JACKPOT!

Follow us on Facebook for exclusive coins offers and bonuses: https://apps.facebook.com/lbc_slots. Please rate us your feedback counts!

This game is intended for an adult audience (21+) and does not offer ‘real money’ gambling’ or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice at this game does not imply future success at ‘real money’ gambling.
